description: This PHP file contains utility functions used for session management, string handling, parameter extraction, mode initialization, and other utility operations within the web application. It defines functions for wrapping session-based mode checks, key-value extraction from data models, and string manipulation, primarily supporting backend data handling and presentation logic.

methods.name: php_getstr
methods.description: Wraps getStr function with session mode checks for WiFi and MoCA in PSM mode.

methods.name: php_getinstanceids
methods.description: Wraps getInstanceIds function with session mode checks for WiFi and MoCA in PSM mode.

methods.name: KeyExtGet
methods.description: Extracts key-value pairs from external data, mapping parameter names to values.

methods.name: encrypt_map
methods.description: Returns a string describing the encryption method based on mode and method parameters.

methods.name: getLeafName
methods.description: Extracts the leaf parameter name from a full data model path.

methods.name: getObjIdInPath
methods.description: Extracts the object ID (like {i}) from a data model path.

methods.name: getParaValues
methods.description: Retrieves specified parameter values from a data model root and maps them into an array.

methods.name: init_psmMode
methods.description: Generates a notification webpage if the PSM session mode is enabled.

methods.name: php_str_and
methods.description: Performs a bitwise AND operation on two hex strings, limited to 16 characters.

methods.name: array_trim
methods.description: Removes leading and trailing whitespace and empty elements from an array.

methods.name: getDefault
methods.description: Reads default parameter values from an XML file for specified parameter names.
